description:
Sales of beer mixed with other beverages

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73421 Beer tax statistics

Definition:
Beer mixed with other beverages refers to beer mixed with
non-alcoholic beverages (lemonade, cola, fruit juices and
other non-alcoholic components). The sales of beer mixed
with other beverages are the quantities on which tax was
paid and the tax-exempt quantities, excluding beer with an
alcoholic strength by volume not exceeding 0.5% vol
(non-alcoholic beer, malt beverages).
